keywords.value: Special Inspector General for Afghanistan Reconstruction
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By TAIMOOR SHAH and ROD NORDLAND
byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah reported from Kandahar, and Rod Nordland from Kabul. Fahim Abed and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: The latest case involved 41 Afghan National Army soldiers who turned over their base in Oruzgan Province, the third post in the province to surrender in the past week.

headline.print_headline: Another Afghan Base Reported Surrendered as Taliban Make Gains
headline.main: Taliban Gain Ground in Afghanistan as Soldiers Surrender Their Posts

snippet: The latest case involved 41 Afghan National Army soldiers who turned over their base in Oruzgan Province, the third post in the province to surrender in the past week....
